post:
Hi Folks,

The UK KVM service has just launched, I thought I would post the offers that fit the LET price structure, no coupon codes required.

Actual plans rage from 512mb Ram up to 32GB Ram.

**KVM 512**
<pre>
4 CPU Cores (Equal Share)
512 MB Ram
10 GB SSD Cached Disk space
500 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
1 x IPv4 address
1 x /64 IPv6
</pre>
PRICE: €2.50 p/month <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=161">ORDER LINK</a> 

**KVM 1024**
<pre>
4 CPU Cores (Equal Share)
1 GB Ram
20 GB SSD Cached Disk space
1000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
1 x IPv4 address
1 x /64 IPv6 
</pre>
PRICE: €4.00 p/month <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=163">ORDER LINK</a>

**OpenVZ 1024**
<pre>
2 vCPU Cores
1GB Ram
1GB vSWAP
25GB Disk
600 GB Bandwidth
1 x IPv4
1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet
</pre>
PRICE: €2.00 p/month <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=126">ORDER LINK</a>

**OpenVZ 2048**
<pre>
2 vCPU Cores
2GB Ram
1GB vSWAP
50GB Disk
1000 GB Bandwidth
1 x IPv4
1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet
</pre>
PRICE: €3.50 p/month <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=127">ORDER LINK</a>

**OpenVZ 3072**
<pre>
2 vCPU Cores
3GB Ram
1GB vSWAP
75GB Disk
1500 GB Bandwidth
1 x IPv4
1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet
</pre>
PRICE: €5.50 p/month <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=128">ORDER LINK</a>


Location: Clouvider, Enfield, London.

Test IPv4/6 on request.

Brief TOS/AUP summary:

No torrents, no Tor, no crypto mining, no game bots, no traffic exchange.

14 day money back guarantee.

Any questions, custom package requests welcome.
